data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Río San Juan, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Río San Juan, Nicaragua

data.prayer: Please, teach the 40,991 believers in Río San Juan, Nicaragua how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire Bible translators to communicate the Scriptures accurately in the heart languages spoken in Río San Juan, Nicaragua.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Río San Juan, Nicaragua.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Río San Juan
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Río San Juan.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.section_summary:
the state of Río San Juan, Nicaragua has a population of 95,500.

We estimate Río San Juan has 40,991 people who might know Jesus, 50,860 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,649 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who are far from you in Río San Juan. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

location.name: Río San Juan
location.cities_list: San Carlos, San Miguelito, Los Chiles, El Almendro, Morrito
location.cities_list_w_pop: San Carlos (13,451), San Miguelito (4,181), Los Chiles (3,342), El Almendro (2,681), Morrito (1,360)
